T02TD1632E:245a-1: tattva au pa de sha / bod skad du /
T02TD1632E:245b-0: de kho na nyid kyi man ngag / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' @245b la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1632E:245b-1: gang gi snying gar padma kha sbyar dbus gnas gsal //
T02TD1632E:245b-2: phra bar blta ba rang byung myong ba'i sems 'jug pa //
T02TD1632E:245b-3: khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba //
T02TD1632E:245b-4: gsal ba'i chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1632E:245b-5: dbang po g-yo ba'i rta kun nang du nges sbyar ba'i //
T02TD1632E:245b-6: ye shes rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snod gyur pa //
T02TD1632E:245b-7: khams gsum bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid du ni nyer 'gro ba //
T02TD1632E:245b-8: mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra ba dri med dpal du 'gyur //
T02TD1632E:245b-9: sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1632E:245b-10: chos ni rjes su dran par bsgom //
T02TD1632E:245b-11: chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1632E:245b-12: chos kyi skur ni rang nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1632E:245b-13: dbus na gsal byed rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1632E:245b-14: ye shes mchog ni shes rnams kyis //
T02TD1632E:245b-15: shin tu bsgoms pa goms pa las //
T02TD1632E:245b-17: snying la rtag tu gnas pa yis //
T02TD1632E:245b-18: thig le gcig pu yi ge med //
T02TD1632E:245b-19: skyes bus de ni bsgoms gyur na //
T02TD1632E:245b-20: ye shes skye bar 'gyur ba'i mchog / rdo rje mkha' 'gro thugs rje can //
T02TD1632E:245b-21: 'di nyid du ni gnas mdzad cing //
T02TD1632E:245b-22: rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems //
T02TD1632E:245b-24: 'di nyid mchod pa nyid kyis ni //
T02TD1632E:245b-25: mchod 'os thams cad mchod pa yin //
T02TD1632E:245b-26: gang zhig 'di la rtag lta ba //
T02TD1632E:245b-27: de ni rgyal ba mchod par bzhed //
T02TD1632E:245b-28: nang gi sbyor ba'i rdo rje yis //
T02TD1632E:245b-30: de bas rdo rje mchod pa yis //
T02TD1632E:245b-31: yid 'dod rnams kyis lus la mchod //
T02TD1632E:245b-32: mchod pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1632E:245b-33: myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par //
T02TD1632E:245b-34: gang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag / de ni phyi rol gzhan du 'dod //
T02TD1632E:245b-35: dngos med gzhi la dgod pa yis //
T02TD1632E:245b-36: lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa ni //
T02TD1632E:245b-37: mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste //
T02TD1632E:245b-38: sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD1632E:245b-39: bsten pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i //
T02TD1632E:245b-40: rgyud 'di don dam ma yin te //
T02TD1632E:245b-41: don dam yang dag skyes pas na //
T02TD1632E:245b-42: ston pa med cing bstan pa med //
T02TD1632E:245b-43: nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yi //
T02TD1632E:245b-44: gnas sogs de nyid la gnas te //
T02TD1632E:245b-45: de bas de kun 'khor ba nyid //
T02TD1632E:245b-46: skyo bya de nyid can gyis min //
T02TD1632E:245b-47: gal te de nyid med gyur na //
T02TD1632E:245b-48: de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig bya //
T02TD1632E:245b-49: 'on te de nyid ldan gyur na //
T02TD1632E:246a-0: @246a * // de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod //
T02TD1632E:246a-1: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas sogs rnams //
T02TD1632E:246a-2: bsten pas dri ma med par 'gyur //
T02TD1632E:246a-3: yang na mi nus bag med pa'i //
T02TD1632E:246a-4: mi yis gnas ni bsgrag par bya //
T02TD1632E:246a-5: nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni //
T02TD1632E:246a-6: sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis te //
T02TD1632E:246a-9: nge bas bsam gtan mchog gzhol bya //
T02TD1632E:246a-11: de yis khams rnams zad par 'gyur //
T02TD1632E:246a-12: de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni //
T02TD1632E:246a-13: rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya //
T02TD1632E:246a-14: dpal ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor can //
T02TD1632E:246a-15: rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis ni //
T02TD1632E:246a-16: thugs rje thugs gdung ring po nas //
T02TD1632E:246a-17: rdo rje rnal 'byor can rnams gzigs //
T02TD1632E:246a-18: de rnams dgyes pas dngos grub mchog / ci 'dod par ni brtson par 'gyur //
T02TD1632E:246a-19: des ni rje btsun ye shes kyang //
T02TD1632E:246a-20: rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1632E:246a-21: sna tshogs spyod pas yang dag ldan //
T02TD1632E:246a-22: spyod dang brtul zhugs bshad pa yi //
T02TD1632E:246a-23: spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir spangs la //
T02TD1632E:246a-24: de nyid brtul zhugs la dga' bya //
T02TD1632E:246a-25: gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas la //
T02TD1632E:246a-26: rnam pa nges byas brtul zhugs can //
T02TD1632E:246a-27: bsam gtan zas mchog gzhol gyur pas //
T02TD1632E:246a-28: smon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis //
T02TD1632E:246a-29: gcer bu'am yang na gcer bu min//
T02TD1632E:246a-30: gang rung ji lta de lta bur //
T02TD1632E:246a-31: rang gis lhag pa'i lhar dmigs la //
T02TD1632E:246a-32: de nyid gcig pu rnam par bsam //
T02TD1632E:246a-33: lkugs pa'i dngos por thal 'gyur bas //
T02TD1632E:246a-34: zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni //
T02TD1632E:246a-35: rnal 'byor can gyis nyer brten na //
T02TD1632E:246a-37: ye shes sgrol ma mchog mthong na //
T02TD1632E:246a-40: dad pa'i tshogs 'dus ji bzhin no //
T02TD1632E:246a-43: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa ni //
T02TD1632E:246a-45: spyod dang 'dis ni nges par ni //
T02TD1632E:246a-46: ji skad bshad par der 'gyur bas //
T02TD1632E:246a-47: sems ni dag par gyis shig ces //
T02TD1632E:246a-48: sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs //
T02TD1632E:246a-49: gang phyir shin tu gsang bas na //
T02TD1632E:246a-50: de nyid bdag gis gsal ma byas //
T02TD1632E:246a-51: des na bla ma yang dag par //
T02TD1632E:246b-0: mnyes byas yang @246b dag 'dod pas blangs //
T02TD1632E:246b-1: dge la dmigs pas nye bar bsags te 'phel ba yis //
T02TD1632E:246b-2: blo gros brtan rnams mngon dga'i dngos grub gnas su 'gro //
T02TD1632E:246b-3: 'gro ba'i spyod pa de ltar snying la yongs bsgoms la //
T02TD1632E:246b-4: dge la mngon par dga' bar skad cig re res gyis [*kyis] //
T02TD1632E:246b-5: de nyid bstan pa legs bris las //
T02TD1632E:246b-6: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
T02TD1632E:246b-7: des ni sems can ma lus kun //
T02TD1632E:246b-8: de nyid rin chen rab gsal shog kho na nyid kyi man ngag legs par bris pa slob dpon blo bzang snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1632E:246b-10: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po k'a m'a la gupta dang /
T02TD1632E:246b-11: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o//
